summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4057 for the improvement of West Hinds Street, West Hanford Street and West Spokane Street, each from California Avenue to 45th Avenue Southwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks together with all necessary cross walks; providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 48951, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
